welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Charlton Kings, where the Cotswold hills meet the bustling city of Cheltenham. Enjoy our picturesque streets, local pubs, and beautiful parks while discovering the history and culture of this lovely town."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gloucestershire Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free. Users must accept terms and conditions before connecting.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
